channel.title: ::addxp command in Testscape..need help with it!
channel.description: hola mis amigos...(hello my friends for the spanish illiterate)I need some help on Testscape, i found this command called ::addxp and its for admins..i think pmods as well..anywho i made my self an admin and figured out that you have to put yer admin name after the ::addxp thing..but..it then says after i press "Enter" "You messed up the command, try again" and this has left me confused on how to make it work....any help will be appreciated, gracias (Thank You) :)

item.title: ::addxp command in Testscape..need help with it!

item.description:
@HeWhoOpensADoor wrote:

hola mis amigos…(hello my friends for the spanish illiterate)I need some help on Testscape, i found this command called ::addxp and its for admins…i think pmods as well…anywho i made my self an admin and figured out that you have to put yer admin name after the ::addxp thing…but…it then says after i press “Enter” “You messed up the command, try again” and this has left me confused on how to make it work…any help will be appreciated, gracias (Thank You)
